program:
# Your program goes here
outsc #msg #endmsg
.loop
out *#idx 1
+ *#idx 1
set #idx r
~ *#idx 122
jmp #loop r

.forever
halt
jmp #forever 1
mmap:
# Allocated memory for your program goes here
.idx
_1
constant:
# Constant values for your program go here
.msg
'Whole printable character set: 
:endmsg
